titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania CAJS Rar Ms 447: Manuscript leaf from an Ashkenazic maḥzor for Pesaḥ.

notesStmt.note: Item cataloged from digital facsimile and existing description.

msIdentifier.repository: Library at the Herbert D. Katz Center for Advanced Judaic Studies

msContents.summary: Consists of the end portion of the Ḳadishta by Shimʻon ben Yitsḥahk, and the reshut to "Ṿa-yosheʻ' that opens with "Ilu fumi nimi" by Meir ben Yitsḥaḳ. Partial leaf, with loss of text at top.

msItem.title: Manuscript leaf from an Ashkenazic maḥzor for Pesaḥ.
msItem.author: Simeon bar Isaac, approximately 950-
Meir ben Isaac Sheliʼaḥ Ẓibbur, -approximately 1096

origin.p: Written in the fourth quarter of the 13th century.

history.provenance: Formerly held in the Library of the Dropsie College for Hebrew and Cognate Learning; given to Dropsie College by David Werner Amram in 1924.
